AdaptiveCards.name: AdaptiveCards
AdaptiveCards.description: Adaptive Cards are a new way for developers to exchange card content in a common and consistent way.

Buttons.name: Buttons
Buttons.description: Buttons appear on the conversation canvas, with the message they belong to.

Carousel.name: Carousel
Carousel.description: A compact, scrollable, horizontal list of cards.

Channeldata.name: Channeldata
Channeldata.description: A way to access channel-specific features.

Codesample.name: CodeSample
Codesample.description: A multi-line, pre-formatted block of text.

DirectMessage.name: DirectMessage
DirectMessage.description: A message sent to a single member of a group conversation.

HeroCard.name: HeroCard
HeroCard.description: A multipurpose formatted attachment; it typically hosts a single image, optional buttons, and a 'tap action', along with text content to display on the card.

List.name: List Layout
List.description: The List Layout is a vertical list of cards.

Location.name: Location
Location.description: Share the user's location with bots.

Members.name: Members
Members.description: Sharing the conversation member list with the bot in group chat.

ReceiptCard.name: ReceiptCard
ReceiptCard.description: Display a receipt to the user.

SigninCard.name: SigninCard
SigninCard.description: A request for the user to authenticate.

SuggestedActions.name: SuggestedActions
SuggestedActions.description: A set of choices that disappears after the user makes a selection.

ThumbnailCard.name: ThumbnailCard
ThumbnailCard.description: A multipurpose formatted attachment; it hosts a small image, optional buttons, and a 'tap action', along with text content to display on the card.
